Package jms.mutualexclusion.assignment3

Class SendReceiverQueue

java.lang.Object
jms.mutualexclusion.assignment3.SendReceiverQueue
public class SendReceiverQueue
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides the main methods required to handle interaction between nodes in the system.
Author:
Vincenzo Fraello (339641), Giorgia Tedaldi (339642)

  • Method Details

    • sendIdRequest

      public void sendIdRequest​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String type) throws javax.jms.JMSException
      This method is used by the client to send the ID request to the client-broker.
      Parameters:
      text - It is the content-text of the message.
      type - It is the type of request.
      Throws:
      javax.jms.JMSException - It is an exception used to handle exceptions that occur during JMS operations.

    • sendIdResponse

      public void sendIdResponse​(javax.jms.Message msg, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String type) throws javax.jms.JMSException
      This method is used by the broker-client to send the ID to the client that requested it.
      Parameters:
      msg - It is the message-request sent by the requester to get its endpoint.
      text - It is the content-text of the message.
      type - It is the type of request.
      Throws:
      javax.jms.JMSException - It is an exception used to handle exceptions that occur during JMS operations.

    • createQueue

      public void createQueue​(java.lang.String id, int type) throws javax.jms.JMSException
      This method is used to create the peer communication queue. Once client has the ID can communicate with other peers.
      Parameters:
      id - It is the id of the queue.
      type - to distinguish broker from other clients.
      Throws:
      javax.jms.JMSException - It is an exception used to handle exceptions that occur during JMS operations.

    • getQueueReceiver

      public javax.jms.QueueReceiver getQueueReceiver()
      This method is used to get the QueueReceiver.
      Returns:
      It returns the QueueReceiver.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String senderId, java.lang.String receiverId) throws javax.jms.JMSException
      This method is used by the node to send any type of message.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the message.
      type - The type of the message.
      senderId - The id of the sender.
      receiverId - The id of the receiver.
      Throws:
      javax.jms.JMSException - It is an exception used to handle exceptions that occur during JMS operations.
